unsigned int stb1[35]={
  450,250,200,250,200,550,200,400,250,550,200,200,250,200,200,250,200,250,250,200,200,550,200,400,250,700,200,250,200,250,200,750,200,250,200};

unsigned int chDown1[35]={
  450,250,200,200,200,600,150,450,200,600,200,200,200,250,200,250,200,250,200,550,200,600,150,450,150,800,150,300,200,550,200,250,150,450,200};

unsigned int tempUp1[51]={8400,4200,550,500,600,450,550,1550,550,1550,550,500,550,500,550,500,600,1500,600,450,550,500,550,500,550,500,600,1500,550,500,600,1500,600,450,600,1500,550,1550,600,450,550,500,550,500,600,1500,600,450,600,1500,600};
unsigned int tempDown1[51]={8450,4150,600,450,600,450,600,450,600,1500,600,450,600,450,600,450,600,1500,550,500,550,500,550,500,600,450,600,1500,600,1500,600,450,550,1550,600,1500,600,1500,600,1500,600,450,550,500,550,500,600,1500,550,500,600};

void stb()
{
  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
  {
    irsend.sendRaw(stb1,35,38);
    delay(55);
  }

}

void tempUp()
{
  for (int i = 0; i <2; i++) {
    irsend.sendRaw(tempUp1,51,38);
    delay(500);
  }

}

void tempDown()
{
  for (int i = 0; i <2; i++) {
    irsend.sendRaw(tempDown1,51,38);
    delay(500);
  }
}


void fadeUp()
{
  irsend.sendNEC(0x10EF18E7, 32);
}
